underlying_goal: To ensure a modern version of bash is installed on macOS as part of the dotfiles setup.
primary_success: Correctly adding the `brew install bash` command to the macOS section of the `install.sh` script.
brief_summary: The user requested that the install script be updated to install a modern version of bash on macOS. Claude edited `install.sh` to add the `brew install bash` command, completing the task.
